channel.title: CVE Feed for SKT Themes -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SKT Themes -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-48036|2024-10-17T13:02:49.661Z -- skt%20themes -- skt%20blocks%20%E2%80%93%20gutenberg%20based%20page%20builder
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in SKT Themes SKT Blocks – Gutenberg based Page Builder allows Stored XSS.This issue affects SKT Blocks – Gutenberg based Page Builder: from n/a through 1.6.
